sentences.chinese: 楚之先祖出自帝顓頊高陽。
sentences.literal: Chu's first ancestors came from Emperor Zhuan Xu Gao Yang.

sentences.chinese: 高陽者，黃帝之孫，昌意之子也。
sentences.literal: Gao Yang was Yellow Emperor's grandson, Chang Yi's son.

sentences.chinese: 高陽生稱，稱生卷章，卷章生重黎。
sentences.literal: Gao Yang begot Cheng. Cheng begot Juan Zhang. Juan Zhang begot Chong Li.

sentences.chinese: 重黎為帝嚳高辛居火正，甚有功，能光融天下，帝嚳命曰祝融。
sentences.literal: Chong Li served Emperor Ku Gao Xin as fire official. He had great merit and could illuminate and unite the world. Emperor Ku named him Zhu Rong.

sentences.chinese: 共工氏作亂，帝嚳使重黎誅之而不盡。
sentences.literal: The Gong Gong clan made rebellion. Emperor Ku sent Chong Li to execute them but he did not complete it.

sentences.chinese: 帝乃以庚寅日誅重黎，而以其弟吳回為重黎後，復居火正，為祝融。
sentences.literal: The emperor then executed Chong Li on the Geng Yin day, and made his younger brother Wu Hui Chong Li's successor. He again served as fire official and became Zhu Rong.

sentences.chinese: 陸終生子六人，坼剖而產焉。
sentences.literal: Lu Zhong begot six sons. They were born by splitting open.

sentences.chinese: 六曰季連，羋姓，楚其後也。
sentences.literal: Sixth named Ji Lian, surnamed Mi. Chu were their descendants.

sentences.chinese: 昆吾氏，夏之時嘗為侯伯，桀之時湯滅之。
sentences.literal: The Kun Wu clan, in Xia times, once was a marquis elder. In Jie's time, Tang extinguished it.
